Yep.Â  And Marcel bought that steel boat from Dave and brought it home with him.Â  The same one that ran onto a shoal in the Ottawa River at twenty knots and stopped dead.Â  No damage to the hull but the two occupants got a bit knocked around...........ðŸ˜²
